Name: Meridian 157: Prologue
About the game: Inspired by classic room escape and point-and-click games, Meridian 157: Prologue takes you on the journey of forensic meteorologist David Zander. Join Dr. Zander as you investigate a mysterious weather anomaly discovered in a remote island in the northern Pacific Ocean. Use your wits to solve puzzles and overcome obstacles to find a way deeper into the island in order to uncover the mystery behind the 157th meridian! Features: • Custom soundtrack and sound effects designed for a creepy in-game atmosphere • Latest episode continuing a spooky and thrilling storyline • Hard and clever puzzles • A logical hint system for some of the most difficult riddles • Graphics rendered with Unreal Engine • Available in 8 languages, including English, French, Russian, German, Chinese (Mandarin), Spanish, Portuguese and Italian! • New colour blind mode available for people who might have trouble with colour based puzzles
